hero.title: The Ultimate
hero.subtitle: Password Manager
hero.description: Generate, store and manage all your passwords securely with military-grade encryption. Everything stays on your device, no external access.
hero.getStartedDescription: Create your free account and start securing your passwords today

localFirst.title: Local-First Security
localFirst.description: Your passwords never leave your device. Everything is encrypted locally with AES-256 encryption.

crossPlatform.title: Cross-Platform Sync
crossPlatform.description: Seamlessly sync across all your devices while maintaining end-to-end encryption.

zeroKnowledge.title: Zero-Knowledge Architecture
zeroKnowledge.description: We can't see your passwords even if we wanted to. Your master password is your key.

generator.title: Smart Password Generator
generator.description: Generate strong, unique passwords with customizable rules and complexity settings.

autofill.title: Secure Autofill
autofill.description: One-click password filling with biometric authentication for maximum convenience.

audit.title: Security Audit
audit.description: Regular security checks to identify weak, reused, or compromised passwords.

security.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
security.subtitle: Your digital life deserves military-grade protection
security.description: Endurance employs the same encryption standards used by governments and financial institutions to protect your most sensitive information.

encryption.title: AES-256 Encryption
encryption.description: Industry-standard encryption that would take billions of years to crack

zeroTrust.title: Zero-Trust Architecture
zeroTrust.description: We never have access to your unencrypted data, ensuring complete privacy

biometric.title: Biometric Protection
biometric.description: Fingerprint and face recognition for secure, convenient access

audit.title: Regular Security Audits
audit.description: Continuous monitoring and third-party security assessments

tools.title: Powerful Security Tools
tools.subtitle: Everything you need for digital security

generator.title: Password Generator
generator.description: Create strong, unique passwords with customizable complexity settings and rules.

breach.title: Breach Monitor
breach.description: Get instant alerts when your accounts are found in data breaches.

analyzer.title: Security Analyzer
analyzer.description: Identify weak, reused, or old passwords that need to be updated.

vault.title: Secure Digital Vault
vault.description: Store sensitive documents, notes, and files with military-grade encryption.

platforms.title: Available Everywhere
platforms.subtitle: Access your passwords on any device, anywhere
platforms.description: Endurance works seamlessly across all your devices with native apps and browser extensions.

cta.title: Ready to Secure Your Digital Life?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of users who trust Endurance with their most important passwords
cta.description: Start your free trial today and experience the peace of mind that comes with military-grade password security.

footer.description: The ultimate password manager with enterprise-grade security and privacy-first approach. Protect your digital life with military-grade encryption.

profile.title: User Profile
profile.description: Manage your account settings and security preferences
